thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Third time here and not the last!
thread.title_full: Third time here and not the last! - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mike S
title: Third time here and not the last!
text:
Stayed here February half term for a 3 night break. The location and price we paid are unbeatable value for money given it's a minute from Westminster bridge!
We arrived early at 12.30pm and the friendly check in staff obliged us with a ground floor family room which was perfect for us.
Clean, spacious comfortable room with two kids beds, the breakfast was delicious, plentiful and hot as usual.
We ate at the restaurant one evening, upgrading to meal deal which is great value (especially in London!) for Breakfast + 2 course meal and a drink for Â£25. The service was excellent here.
We ate at Planet Hollywood one evening which is a 20 minute walk.
In the words of one of the ex-owners of that establishment - I'LL BE BACK !!
